","component_path":"text","id":"kb6a8885","style":{"color":"rgba(229, 234, 255, 0.7)","fontSize":"18px","lineHeight":"30px","margin":[["top","0px"],["bottom","0px"],["left",""],["right",""]],"padding":[["left","20%"],["right","20%"]]},"media":{"mobile":{"style":{"padding":[["left","5px"],["right","5px"]]}}}}],"id":"cr1ohouv","_elType":"COLUMN","type":"column","component_path":"column","attr":{"__class__columnSize":"1/1"}}],"id":"ljcvwv7n","_elType":"ROW","component_path":"row","style":{}},{"name":"Row","type":"row","content":[{"name":"Column","style":{"textAlign":"center","margin":[["top","30px"],["bottom","30px"]],"border":[["width","0px"],["style","solid"],["color","rgba(117, 125, 154, 0.3)"],["bottom-width",""],["bottom-color",""]],"padding":[["top","0px"],["bottom","40px"],["left","40px"],["right","40px"]],"borderRadius":"10px 10px 10px 10px","backgroundColor":"#2E2F3D","overflowY":"visible"},"content":[{"type":"icon","name":"Icon","_elType":"ELEMENT","component_path":"icon","icon":{"size":"25px","color":"#FFFFFF","icon":{"prefix":"far","iconName":"credit-card"}},"id":"494x6ugf","wrapper":{"textAlign":"center"},"settings":{"activeBgStyle":"color"},"style":{"backgroundImage":{"gradient":""},"padding":[["top","25px"],["bottom","25px"],["left","23px"],["right","23px"]],"borderRadius":"50% 50% 50% 50%","backgroundColor":"#2E2F3D","boxShadow":{"type":"","x":"0px","y":"5px","blur":"15px","spread":"0px","color":"#17171D"},"margin":[["top","-30px"]]},"attr":{"href":"https://www.rbi.org.in/commonperson/English/Scripts/Notification.aspx?Id=2311","target":"_blank"}},{"name":"Title","titleType":"h4","type":"heading","_elType":"ELEMENT","component_path":"title","content":"

Kisan Credit Card

","id":"wcjv175b","style":{"fontSize":"22px","color":"#ffffff","margin":[["bottom","15px"],["top","40px"]]},"wrapper":{"attr":{"href":"https://www.rbi.org.in/commonperson/English/Scripts/Notification.aspx?Id=2311","target":"_blank"}}},{"type":"text","name":"Text","_elType":"ELEMENT","content":"

Kisan Credit Card (KCC) is a specially designed credit card for farmers. This card gives you the facility of hassle-free and convenient credit to meet your day-to-day farming requirements. To provide timely and adequate credit to farmers to meet their production credit needs besides meeting contingency expenses through simplified procedure facilitating the borrowers for availing loans as and when they need

","component_path":"text","id":"7wdnu31c","style":{"color":"rgba(229, 234, 255, 0.7)","fontSize":"17px","lineHeight":"28px","margin":[["top","0px"],["bottom","0px"],["left",""],["right",""]]}}],"id":"5l9k0k39","_elType":"COLUMN","type":"column","component_path":"column","attr":{"__class__columnSize":"1/3"},"media":{"tablet":{"attr":{"__class__columnSize":"1/1"}}}},{"name":"Column","style":{"textAlign":"center","margin":[["top","30px"],["bottom","30px"]],"border":[["width","0px"],["style","solid"],["color","rgba(117, 125, 154, 0.3)"],["bottom-width",""],["bottom-color",""]],"padding":[["top","0px"],["bottom","40px"],["left","40px"],["right","40px"]],"borderRadius":"10px 10px 10px 10px","backgroundColor":"#2E2F3D","overflowY":"visible"},"content":[{"type":"icon","name":"Icon","_elType":"ELEMENT","component_path":"icon","icon":{"size":"25px","color":"#FFFFFF","icon":{"prefix":"fas","iconName":"warehouse"}},"id":"vp8f634v","wrapper":{"textAlign":"center"},"settings":{"activeBgStyle":"color"},"style":{"backgroundImage":{"gradient":""},"padding":[["top","25px"],["bottom","25px"],["left","23px"],["right","23px"]],"borderRadius":"50% 50% 50% 50%","backgroundColor":"#2E2F3D","boxShadow":{"type":"","x":"0px","y":"5px","blur":"15px","spread":"0px","color":"#17171D"},"margin":[["top","-30px"]]},"attr":{"href":"https://www.agrifarming.in/nabard-subsidy-for-godown-guidelines-rules-eligibility","target":"_blank"}},{"name":"Title","titleType":"h4","type":"heading","_elType":"ELEMENT","component_path":"title","content":"

Rural Godowns

","id":"qm1jtaxs","style":{"fontSize":"22px","color":"#ffffff","margin":[["bottom","15px"],["top","40px"]]},"wrapper":{"attr":{"href":"https://www.agrifarming.in/nabard-subsidy-for-godown-guidelines-rules-eligibility","target":"_blank"}}},{"type":"text","name":"Text","_elType":"ELEMENT","content":"

The main objective of this scheme is to help farmers throughout the country by providing them with godowns. This will, in turn, improve their holding capacity drastically and as a result, they will be able to sell their produce at fair rates, rather than selling them under distress.

","component_path":"text","id":"igncicvz","style":{"color":"rgba(229, 234, 255, 0.7)","fontSize":"17px","lineHeight":"28px","margin":[["top","0px"],["bottom","0px"],["left",""],["right",""]]}}],"id":"b834jsh5","_elType":"COLUMN","type":"column","component_path":"column","attr":{"__class__columnSize":"1/3"},"media":{"tablet":{"attr":{"__class__columnSize":"1/1"}}}},{"name":"Column","style":{"textAlign":"center","margin":[["top","30px"],["bottom","30px"]],"border":[["width","0px"],["style","solid"],["color","rgba(117, 125, 154, 0.3)"],["bottom-width",""],["bottom-color",""]],"padding":[["top","0px"],["bottom","40px"],["left","40px"],["right","40px"]],"borderRadius":"10px 10px 10px 10px","backgroundColor":"#2E2F3D","overflowY":"visible"},"content":[{"type":"icon","name":"Icon","_elType":"ELEMENT","component_path":"icon","icon":{"size":"25px","color":"#FFFFFF","icon":{"prefix":"fas","iconName":"hat-cowboy"}},"id":"fx1hrurv","wrapper":{"textAlign":"center"},"settings":{"activeBgStyle":"color"},"style":{"backgroundImage":{"gradient":""},"padding":[["top","25px"],["bottom","25px"],["left","23px"],["right","23px"]],"borderRadius":"50% 50% 50% 50%","backgroundColor":"#2E2F3D","boxShadow":{"type":"","x":"0px","y":"5px","blur":"15px","spread":"0px","color":"#17171D"},"margin":[["top","-30px"]]},"attr":{"href":"https://www.nabard.org/content1.aspx?id=591&catid=23&mid=530","target":"_blank"}},{"name":"Title","titleType":"h4","type":"heading","_elType":"ELEMENT","component_path":"title","content":"

Dairy Entrepreneurship Development

","id":"gg0f1q36","style":{"fontSize":"22px","color":"#ffffff","margin":[["bottom","15px"],["top","40px"]]},"wrapper":{"attr":{"href":"https://www.nabard.org/content1.aspx?id=591&catid=23&mid=530","target":"_blank"}}},{"type":"text","name":"Text","_elType":"ELEMENT","content":"

This scheme is meant to promote the dairy sector, specifically by setting up modernized dairy farms, promoting calf rearing, provide infrastructure, upgrading logistical operations to improve the product on a commercial scale, and generate self-employment.

","component_path":"text","id":"c8vcp4wz","style":{"color":"rgba(229, 234, 255, 0.7)","fontSize":"17px","lineHeight":"28px","margin":[["top","0px"],["bottom","0px"],["left",""],["right",""]]}}],"id":"gj0if1jk","_elType":"COLUMN","type":"column","component_path":"column","attr":{"__class__columnSize":"1/3"},"media":{"tablet":{"attr":{"__class__columnSize":"1/1"}}}}],"id":"p1b4fqjz","_elType":"ROW","component_path":"row","style":{"margin":[["top","60px"]]},"settings":{"columnGap":"60px","reverseColumn":false},"media":{"tablet":{"settings":{"columnGap":"60px"}}}}],"id":"oyhlheds","type":"section","_elType":"SECTION","component_path":"section","style":{"padding":[["top","100px"],["bottom","70px"]],"backgroundColor":"#17171D","__backgroundType":"gradient","backgroundImage":{"gradient":[["type","linear"],["direction","45deg"],["start",["#FC466B","0%"]],["end",["#3F5EFB","100%"]]]},"backgroundRepeat":"no-repeat","minHeight":"auto"},"attr":{"id":"schemes"}},{"name":"Section","content":[{"name":"Row","type":"row","content":[{"name":"Column","style":{"textAlign":"center"},"content":[{"name":"Title","titleType":"h2","type":"heading","_elType":"ELEMENT","component_path":"title","content":"

Due to the absence of collateral and lack of credit options, farmers end up at the mercy of money lenders who charge high interest, and when their farm doesn’t produce because of droughts or floods, they fall into debt traps.
